title: Madame Sin (1972 - UK) [Bette Davis, Robert Wagner] thriller
description:
Madame Sin (1972 - UK)

Thriller

starring . . . . Bette Davis, Robert Wagner, Denholm Elliott, Gordon Jackson
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0067375/


Madame Sin is about a shadowy figure with seemingly unlimited funds who is out for world domination. She kidnaps a CIA agent and through mind control, forces him to assist her in stealing a Polaris submarine. With distinct overtones of James Bond, this film is high on sleek 70's glamour and bleak 70's pessimism. Bette Davis parades around in the most outlandish wigs, makeup and fashions and exudes some serious evil. As the film concludes you just might be in for a bit of a surprise as the plot deals its final twist.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 720x544, 25.000 fps, 2600 Kbps, 01h26m27s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 192 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
